T01n833u_001:4: vande bhaktyā praṇamitaśirasā nirvṛtā yena buddhāḥ || 1 ||
T01n833u_001:6: śrāvastyāṃ lumbikāyāṃ kuśinagaravare kāpilākhye ca sthāne |
T01n833u_001:8: ye cānye dhātucaityā daśabalabalitā tān namasyāmi buddhān || 2 ||
T01n833u_001:9: kailāśe hemakūṭe himavati nilaye mandare merūśṛṅge
T01n833u_001:12: ye cānye dhātucaityā daśabalavalitā tān namasyāmi buddhān || 3 ||
T01n833u_001:13: kāśmīre cīnadeśe khasatavarapure balkale siṃhale vā
T01n833u_001:16: ye cānye dhātucaityā daśabalavalitā tān namasyāmi buddhān || 4 ||
T01n833u_001:17: ye ca syurdhātugarbhā daśabalatanujāḥ kumbhasaṃjñāśca caityāḥ
T01n833u_001:19: pātāle ye ca bhūmyāṃ giriśikharagatā ye ca vittāḥ samantād
T01n833u_001:20: buddhānāṃ ye ca vimbāḥ pratidinasukṛtastān namasyāmi buddhān || 5 ||
